root: ^[Rowan] How have you been? Long time no see! Have you been hanging in there?
^[Addison] Eh, I dunno. Everything is alright.
^[Rowan] You know, we all miss your mom. She would come in every morning for a cup of coffee and a sugar donut. Her presence was very well-known.
^[Rowan] I’m sorry… I realized I made you a bit sad. If you need anything from us, feel free to drop by. Free donuts on the house.
